name: FoodLog-AI4DM
0:
”Alexa, open food log”
”Alexa, start food log”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: food log
des:
Food Log - AI4DM is meant to track the user’s daily food intake. This skill is designed for specific users involved in a research project at University of Alabama at Birmingham (AI4DM) to log their food intake throughout the day which will help the health coaches to guide the participant in maintaining healthy habits. 

To use the food log, you need to begin by saying Alexa, I want to log my food. You need to answer to few simple questions asked by Alexa: 

- What did you eat?
- At what time did you eat?
- How much did you have?

Alexa will ask for the food log detail until it gets the information about Food Name (e.g., Apple), TimeOfMeal (e.g., Breakfast), and Quantity (e.g. 2) before saving it.

You can log as many food intakes as you want by saying "I WANT TO LOG MORE". OR
You can say “STOP” or “I AM DONE” to end the session. 

Anytime if you're lost, you can ask for 'HELP' or 'CANCEL' the request.
-----------------------------------------------------------------
Upon enabling the Food Log skill, the user will be asked to provide the permission for First Name, and Email Address. The email is required to verify user's AI4DM account connected with amazon (Alexa app), and without email verification user won't be able to to use the Food Log skill. However, The permission for First name is optional and only required if user want to enable the personalized greetings.

Please follow below steps to grant the permissions for first name and email.

i) Go to Food log skill settings in Alexa app, and click the checkboxes besides First name, and Email Address. Or
ii) On Alexa app home screen the "Grant Food Log- AI4DM permissions" card will shown, user can click on this card to see permissions screen. 
-----------------------------------------------------------------
Sample example is given below-

User: Alexa, open food log
Skill: hi! welcome to food log. what can I do for you?
User: I want to log my food 
Skill: sure, what did you eat?
User: I ate apple.
Skill: At what time did you eat apple?
User: breakfast
Skill: how much apple did you have?
User: 2 slices
Skill: Successfully logged your food. If you want to log more food items, simply say I want to log more, else say I am done.
User: I am done
Skill: Thank you for using the food log skill today, goodbye!
